job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI. You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community. You are the expert on software development in the team making you the liaison for of the PostNL engineering community where we share "best practices" and innovations in our business.

   This is why you choose PostNL as your job title
   Visible Work: With this team, you will be the first to test and work with new tools and techniques from the market so that PostNL's Data Science community can create even more innovative solutions...
   Challenge: This new team aims to act as an innovation hub for data science and as a benchmark for all decentralised teams and drive progress in new technologies such as generative IA. The team also acts as a supportive leader in the data science chapter
   Good atmosphere: You will work with colleagues who dare to seize opportunities and push each other forward.
   Freedom: You will work from home and at a flex spot in our bustling, state-of-the-art office in the historic Stationspost building (next to Holland Spoor station).
   Responsibility: You largely fill in your role and working hours yourself.
   Development opportunities: You will have plenty of opportunities to follow training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.

   This is your role:

   As a senior full-stack developer, you will help create innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms. You will take on the engineering part for the team, optimising code efficiency and exploring new, fast solutions. In doing so, you will help drive innovation in technologies and foster a culture of continuous improvement; Automate security controls and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability; Explore new AWS services and optimise product performance through experimentation and testing;

   Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge; Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library,focusing on best practices and innovation; Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible.

   Your colleagues
   You will join the Analytics Innovation team, a recently established team within PostNL that focuses on technological innovations in data science and algorithms to further advance our business. Our team consists of a manager, a principal, senior and medior data scientist, and a junior data engineer. Within our team, we value a good working atmosphere, where we have fun, deliver value quickly, iterate quickly and work closely with each other and with other (innovation) teams. Our team is part of the Data Foundation business unit and consists of around 65 colleagues, most of whom specialise as data engineers or platform engineers., Some final post ...
     * Rather have a cup of coffee or tea with us first to find out more about the job or PostNL? You can! Call or email the recruiter. Then we'll schedule an appointment right away.
     * During the application we will do a background check. We will ask you for a Certificate of Good Conduct (VOG). We will also check your references and possibly do a customisation test.
     * We are looking for new colleagues who want to work with us to build the PostNL of the future. We therefore return mail from recruitment agencies.
     * For this position, you can choose between a Macbook or Windows engineer laptop
job_details.full_text:
Senior Fullstack Developer

As a senior full-stack developer, you will help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI. You take the lead in developing innovative solutions, collaborating with experts and promoting technology in the data science community. You are the expert on software development in the team making you the liaison for of the PostNL engineering community where we share "best practices" and innovations in our business.

   This is why you choose PostNL as your job title
   Visible Work: With this team, you will be the first to test and work with new tools and techniques from the market so that PostNL's Data Science community can create even more innovative solutions...
   Challenge: This new team aims to act as an innovation hub for data science and as a benchmark for all decentralised teams and drive progress in new technologies such as generative IA. The team also acts as a supportive leader in the data science chapter
   Good atmosphere: You will work with colleagues who dare to seize opportunities and push each other forward.
   Freedom: You will work from home and at a flex spot in our bustling, state-of-the-art office in the historic Stationspost building (next to Holland Spoor station).
   Responsibility: You largely fill in your role and working hours yourself.
   Development opportunities: You will have plenty of opportunities to follow training programmes and grow into other positions or departments.

   This is your role:

   As a senior full-stack developer, you will help create innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms. You will take on the engineering part for the team, optimising code efficiency and exploring new, fast solutions. In doing so, you will help drive innovation in technologies and foster a culture of continuous improvement; Automate security controls and build robust CI/CD pipelines, championing efficiency and reliability; Explore new AWS services and optimise product performance through experimentation and testing;

   Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge; Provide expertise in building and maintaining a code library,focusing on best practices and innovation; Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible.

   Your colleagues
   You will join the Analytics Innovation team, a recently established team within PostNL that focuses on technological innovations in data science and algorithms to further advance our business. Our team consists of a manager, a principal, senior and medior data scientist, and a junior data engineer. Within our team, we value a good working atmosphere, where we have fun, deliver value quickly, iterate quickly and work closely with each other and with other (innovation) teams. Our team is part of the Data Foundation business unit and consists of around 65 colleagues, most of whom specialise as data engineers or platform engineers., Some final post ...
     * Rather have a cup of coffee or tea with us first to find out more about the job or PostNL? You can! Call or email the recruiter. Then we'll schedule an appointment right away.
     * During the application we will do a background check. We will ask you for a Certificate of Good Conduct (VOG). We will also check your references and possibly do a customisation test.
     * We are looking for new colleagues who want to work with us to build the PostNL of the future. We therefore return mail from recruitment agencies.
     * For this position, you can choose between a Macbook or Windows engineer laptop

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software development, MLOps, and exploring new technologies, including generative AI. However, it lacks specific details about core AI/ML modeling tasks such as algorithm development, training, or fine-tuning generative models. The role seems to be more about building and maintaining platforms and pipelines for data science and AI, rather than directly developing AI models. The emphasis on 'full-stack developer' and 'engineering part' suggests a strong software engineering foundation applied to AI/data science contexts, but not a specialized AI/ML role. The mention of 'generative IA' and 'data science' is present but not detailed enough to classify it as a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer.

job_tasks.justification: The job description repeatedly mentions 'senior full-stack developer', 'software development', 'engineering part', 'optimising code efficiency', 'build robust CI/CD pipelines', 'AWS SDK solutions', and 'code library'. This indicates a strong focus on building and maintaining software systems.
The role involves creating innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms, which requires software development skills.
job_tasks.phrase: create innovative solutions and functionality on Data Science platforms

job_tasks.justification: Optimizing code efficiency is a core software development task.
Automating security controls and building robust CI/CD pipelines are key components of MLOps and operations engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Automate security controls and build robust CI/CD pipelines

job_tasks.justification: Championing efficiency and reliability in pipelines is an MLOps responsibility.
Exploring new AWS services and optimizing product performance through experimentation and testing falls under software development and platform engineering.
job_tasks.phrase: Explore new AWS services and optimise product performance through experimentation and testing

job_tasks.justification: Guiding and teaching colleagues about software engineering knowledge is a senior developer responsibility.
job_tasks.phrase: Guide and teach colleagues, actively sharing your software engineering knowledge

job_tasks.justification: Building and maintaining a code library with best practices is a software development task.
job_tasks.phrase: building and maintaining a code library,focusing on best practices and innovation

job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on AWS SDK solutions is a software development task, especially when pushing boundaries.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate on the development of AWS SDK solutions, pushing the boundaries of what is possible

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to help PostNL make strides in data science and generative AI, indicating a need to understand business goals related to these areas.
job_tasks.phrase: help PostNL make great strides in data science and generative AI

job_tasks.justification: Promoting technology and acting as a liaison for best practices implies understanding and communicating business value of technology.
job_tasks.phrase: promoting technology in the data science community

job_tasks.justification: While the job mentions 'generative AI' and 'data science', it does not specify tasks related to building, training, or fine-tuning models. The focus is on the engineering and platform aspects.
